main event: A witness observed a round red light thought to be aircraft lights, exhibiting speed faster than that of jet aircraft in Miamisburg, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for three minutes while the observer was in a moving vehicle,The object appeared to move with great speed and only turned away before disappearing,The light was described as solid red and emitted a slight sound,The observer had a clear sky condition during the sighting, and this report is part of the Project Blue Book documentation.
witness description: 19 year old female, observed the object from a moving car
